name: hunterx-minecraft-bot
description: Advanced Minecraft automation bot with PvP, dupe testing, stash hunting, and schematic building capabilities

scripts.check-optional-deps: node -e "let libs=[]; try{require('brain.js'); libs.push('brain.js')}catch(e){}; try{require('ml5'); libs.push('ml5')}catch(e){}; try{require('synaptic'); libs.push('synaptic')}catch(e){}; try{require('@tensorflow/tfjs-node'); libs.push('@tensorflow/tfjs-node')}catch(e){}; console.log('[INFO] Neural libraries available: ' + (libs.length ? libs.join(', ') : 'none - bot will use fallback AI'))"
